name: The Thanos Principle_VR
description:
This project uses the XR Device Simulator which allows us to move, teleport and interact with the environment using the keyboard and mouse.

The Keyboard Controls

  • A/D - Turn left/right
  • S - Turn 180'
  • T - Enable left hand
  • Y - Enable right hand
  • G - Interact(grab/teleport)
  • Z - Fire projectile launcher
  • Q - Cycle through projectiles

To look around- press and hold the MMB and RMB while moving the mouse around. Be careful not to lose track of which way your hands are facing.

To move hands closer/farther away- select a hand(T/Y or both) and scroll the MMB towards/away from you.

To Teleport - The entire grey ground is a teleport area allowing the player move to any location on the ground facing the player's original direction. When teleportation is possible, a square, black reticle will appear.

On the left hand is a projectile launcher upon which you may place each of the colored cubes, thus reloading that particular projectile.

To pick up a cube

  • select the right hand(Y), 
  • aim the colored ray which emanates from the right hand towards a cube until a circular, yellow reticle appears(press/hold MMB & RMB and move the mouse)
  • pick up the cube(G)

To Widen/Narrow Arm Span 

  • select a hand(T or Y)
  • press and hold RMB while moving the mouse left/right

To Move Camera Left/Right - press & hold RMB and move mouse left/right
